title: wo-way calendar sync
description: Connect your team's calendars to Zoho Bookings. Avoid double-booking and increase efficiency. See your schedule for the day, week, and month on our calendar dashboard.

title: Team scheduling
description: Share pooled availability with customers on the booking page. Allow customers to choose a staff member or opt for using our routing algorithms to allocate appointments.

title: Update your CRM
description: Keep track of your appointments and plan for follow-up from your CRM. Use our built-in integration with Zoho CRM or connect to another CRM with Zapier or Zoho Flow.

title: Notifications and reminders
description: Send emails and SMSes to confirm and remind about appointments. Personalize emails with the customer name, the sender address, and the online meeting link.

title: Booking page
description: Choose from three types of booking pages: staff, service and workspace. Select a template that resonates with your brand. Embed the booking page on your website or map it to your domain.

title: Online payment
description: Collect payments ahead of your appointment and minimize losses due to no-shows. Avoid awkward payment follow-ups. You can collect a deposit or partial payment, too.
